Html: I must say this is a nice and smooth triangulation algorithm I have ever use. To make it better, I notice that at the Mesh class, a static object Triangle dummytri and Segment dummysub were used and this could cause a problem when two or more different thread are running and referring to the same objects at the same time, not sure whether you notice about this issue or not?
I guess you are refering to the beta 3 code? The latest code removes most of the static objects, so processing multiple meshes in parallel should work.

Hi,

Just tested the code, I notice there are a lot of changes if compare to beta 3. Anyway it works perfectly! Thanks for your great Job.

Is this latest code will be used to replace the previous beta 3 in the future?
Yes. Some of the major changes are documented here.
